WRITING.TEXT: Reminds me of far cry

I was a Job Corps student, which was a way for me to get a job and a high school diploma at the time. They would have you stay in dorms, follow a daily routine on schedules they made up for you. my campus was in the Black Hills National Forest with no internet or way to use a cell phone to call home. I lived pretty far away from campus, so I had to travel nearly 4-5 hours if I had to see home, and only when I was allowed by the campus staff. Coming to a place like that was a first for me, and pretty much the first time I left home in my life. But I was there for 2 years, rarely seeing or hearing from everyone I knew. With me going home being so rare. I missed out on a lot, my sister coming home from college for Christmas, My dad being sick and eventually passing away, and Pretty much most major game and or movie release. It #8217;s a beautiful campus for Job Corps, but the people were not always tolerable or the most hygienic. You had to deal with grown adults who argued to not clean up or let alone shower. Staff chose favorites, a lot people just wanted to leave, because others made it harder for the people who needed this education and help. I #8217;m glad it was something I completed, but I #8217;m also glad that I have control over my life again.
Wolf Alice, their song #8220;Visions of a Life #8221;, was a great surprise for me. Play all their songs now on repeat.

I #8217;m adopted, and I had thanksgiving at the family #8217;s house. My sister from my adoptive family was being harassed/hit on by my brother from my original family. He would show up drunk and make things awkward and annoying. Say inappropriate things directed to my sister and sometimes my mom. He also wasn #8217;t invited to the family event, he never is. He still preys for her at the bars whenever she comes home from college. I also found out recently that my distant family members on my adoptive side, think I #8217;m just like him. So I now look bad as well at other family events, just for being blood related to him.
Omg, all the cringe just hit me non stop.
Will I get banned for stream sniping, for not laughing?
Voice deeper than mine
Confirmed, persona better than avengers
Creative freedom is always a good thing! Can #8217;t wait to see what happens.
Heck
I was kinda expecting her to keep flipping him.
Good bot

I do like this game a lot, but to me it just feel like the aiming is still off. In the settings for the controller I use preset 4 for aiming, but looking in some directions is slower unless you are looking completely vertical or horizontally. Lastly even with the sensitivity all the way up it still feels sluggish. Regardless of all that I completed the game and enjoyed the graphics and story, can #8217;t wait for more. I just hope the aiming and looking gets better.

From what I can tell, they fixed it to where you aim slightly easier In aiming preset 4. But only when looking vertically and horizontally. Anything in between that is still slow, while the overall sensitivity is still sluggish even when set to max. There is definitely room for improvement. But beating or playing the game isn #8217;t impossible, it #8217;s just difficult for some to work with sometimes; Especially if you are being swarmed by a group of mutants. Hopefully they make to where aiming is more natural.
Liked that game too!

WalrusGravy I #8217;m 21 from South Dakota. I currently mostly play Halo MCC, Overwatch, Rainbow 6, Battlefield V, Mortal Kombat x amp; 11, Destiny 2, and World war Z. I am online most of the time and always ready to play whatever and whenever. Will be glad to meet anyone new!

Gt: WalrusGravy I play a lot of shooters and I #8217;m open to play whatever! I would love to co-op or do quick matches with friends! It has been years since I did anything with a group of friends online. So I #8217;m sorry if I come off as shy! All my Xbox friends moved to over to pc and I #8217;m the only one with Xbox!

I have halo mcc, most cod games, gears 3 amp;4, battlefield v, rainbow six, doom, world war z, all of far cry 1-new dawn and some others in catalog. I also play other games too like dark souls, mortal Kombat x amp; 11, and injustice 2. Other than all that I #8217;m open to any suggestions!
Red faction please!!!!

WRITING.TITLE: Tour of duty 1 content?
WRITING.TEXT: I couldn't get the game at launch and had outside responsibilities. so I finally just now got the game, I really liked the winter Kait and scarred JD skins but I am unable to get them since the tour of duty 1 ended? My question is, will the content from Tour of duty 1 comeback at some point in hopefully the near future?
I like the game! and I might if it the content comes back eventually. Have to say the game is fun, just not really a fan so far of the whole timed content thing.
I hope so!
That would be great, I would come back to the game more in the future, if that were the case!
I think it would be good for people who missed out or like me, bought the game after the first season ended. Personally, having more options to get/earn character skins wouldn #8217;t hurt the game.

If I had to be honest, the multiplayer is the weakest part of the game. I find the gameplay fun and it looks great too! But everything from the progression, how you get skins, and even new challenges is a total drag. The skins I wanted were playable in the campaign too! They are literally in the game, would have been nice to earn them for multiplayer by completing the chapters they were in but, you know....money?
Diet hunter

online play might not be worth it now. I thought the campaign was decent. It has offline capabilities with bots for local play, it also has its own take on zombies. most CODs have offline bots and zombies which adds some replayability beyond the story mode.
Wasn #8217;t his eyes supposed to glow red under his visor too? Thought that would have been cool.
